sub_title: Head of Marketing @valantic NL - together, ahead in digital
summary:
Dedicated marketing professional with a hospitality heart, business brains & a passion for technology and innovation. 

At this moment I am responsible for the marketing team of valantic. This year we rebranded from 30 years of ISM to valantic. This was a great challenge, as we were the first non-German speaking company that was added to the valantic corporation. Together with our team of marketing professionals we organized the internal and external rebranding, including adjusting the corporate strategy.

I can describe myself as an ambitious, dedicated professional who is eager to learn and always goes the extra mile achieve the best results. This also is expressed in my personal life where I ran two marathons (Berlin 2018, Rotterdam 2013) and have the ambition to run another one! (New York?)

Specialties: exploring and using the latest trends on technology and e-commerce to optimize the customer experience, in order to improve the customer satisfaction. 

Personal skills: Self-motivated, positive, resilient, caring, sincere, ability to work under pressure and teamplayer.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

education.field_of_study: Certificates Financial Supervision Act  (WFT – Dutch Law)

projects.title: Rebranding ISM eCompany to valantic NL
projects.description:
After 30 years, ISM eCompany has decided to adopt a new name and market positioning as a full-service digital commerce agency. With valantic, we aim to challenge clients to become digital frontrunners in their markets. We serve over a thousand clients, generate €270 million in revenue, and have a team of over three thousand employees.
As the project leader of the rebranding, my responsibilities included aligning the rebranding strategy with business objectives, rebranding marketing materials, and coordinating with the corporate head office. I ensured a seamless transition by aligning the strategy with the company's goals. All marketing materials were redesigned to reflect the valantic identity. Close collaboration with the corporate head office maintained consistency and leveraged available resources. These efforts established valantic as a leading digital commerce agency.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing @valantic NL - together, ahead in digital

projects.title: Rebranding The Manhattan Hotel to Rotterdam Marriott Hotel early 2016
projects.description:
Rebranding The Manhattan Hotel Rotterdam to the Rotterdam Marriott Hotel early 2016. 

This project included:
- Learning all about the Marriott values and brand voice
- Changing our online content and all our internal and external collaterals
- Connecting with all Marriott systems
- Creating a new marketing strategy for Marriott Rewards members

Acknowledgement 
Winning Marriott's International 'One team driving results' award for our rebranding activities and driving brand awareness.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing @valantic NL - together, ahead in digital
General Manager bij The Rotterdam Marriott Hotel

projects.title: 2015 New website for The Manhattan Hotel Rotterdam
projects.description:
Together with a team created the new website for The Manhattan Hotel Rotterdam to increase direct conversion. 
This project included:
1.	Liaising with Management team and hotel employees team to create the right brand voice and corporate identity for the new website.
2.	Working together with external design team to translate our storyboard to the actual website.
3.	Creating all content for the website (copywriting /SEO)
4.	Organizing and executing photo shoots to create new photo material for the website.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing @valantic NL - together, ahead in digital
General Manager bij The Rotterdam Marriott Hotel
Regional General Manager at Lore Group

projects.title: 2014 Distribution Project
projects.description:
Analyzed the hotel’s distribution channels and how to improve these channels, by choosing better partners and new technologies to optimize our guest experience and customer journey to drive more revenue. 
This extensive research led to the following changes within the hotel:
1.	Implementation of new guest communication tool for pre-and post stay e-mailings, mobile concierge and e-mail marketing campaigns.
2.	Implementation of guest voice tool to analyze our performance on review websites and monitor guest feedback and requests, with analytics for tracking and escalation.
3.	Plan to change our current website to drive more direct revenue.

After 5 great and challenging years in the beautiful Rotterdam Marriott Hotel, I’ve decided to go on a new adventure! During this period I traveled the world for 250 days together with my partner, to get inspired and enjoy life! 
Visited Countries: Peru, Bolivia, Chile, Argentina, New Zealand, Australia, Taiwan, Thailand, Malaysia and Indonesia
